product_name: Goal Zero Rock Out Portable Speaker - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The updated Goal Zero Rock Out portable speaker offers rugged and weather-resistant performance, producing great sound from your music player and letting you enjoy your tunes virtually anywhere. Internal battery can be recharged directly from a Goal Zero Nomad 7 foldable solar panel (not included) or via USB. Power indicator lets you know when the speaker is on or if the rechargeable battery is receiving a charge through the USB port. Wooden sound box and bass speakers deliver a full range of high-quality sound. Zippered opening has room to store music player inside for protection. Easily hang the Goal Zero Rock Out portable speaker from a pack, bike stem or belt with the cinchable shock cord. Closeout.
short_description: The updated Goal Zero Rock Out portable speaker offers rugged and weather-resistant performance, producing great sound from your music player and letting you enjoy your tunes virtually anywhere.
